column4: so, I was wanting to switch somebody to ubuntu, (nub) but I'm having difficulty getting wmv support that is embedded in web pages. Is there anything that I can use?
ive seen that a lot depends on the specific web page.  Some sites just do things oddly at times.
i second Seveas  in the  'use mozilla-mplayer'  idea also. :)
seen one mentioned at the webupd8 blog site. but its not officially supported by this channel.. i just install gnome-shell on ubuntu...
